job.jobDescriptionText: Mission-driven public benefit corp building industry cloud for life sciences. Full-time remote-friendly role in Portland, OR. Responsibilities: participate in all SDLC phases; design and build cutting-edge life sciences apps with PMs, engineers, and domain experts; collaborate with QA for comprehensive coverage; troubleshoot and support production; mentor junior engineers. Requirements: 5+ years software product development; strong JavaScript + React; backend experience in Java; SQL/RDBMS (MySQL/Oracle/SQL Server); CSS abstraction (SASS/JSS); strong communication; BS CS/Engineering or equivalent; proven mentoring track record. Nice: Agile, Spring, ES6, SaaS background, content management knowledge. Compensation listed $110kâ€“$270k base; flexible PTO; medical/dental/vision; 1% charitable giving.
